amendment.description: An amendment to add at the end of the bill a new section which seeks to reduce by $125 the amount of tax reduction for taxpayers with an adjusted gross income in excess of $1,000,000.

action.text: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Obey to the Shadegg amendment (A013).
Mr. Regula raised a point of order against the Obey amendment (A014). Mr. Regula stated that the amendment constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
